welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cikupa, a charming city known for its traditional markets and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer. Selamat datang! (Welcome!)

restaurants.name: Nasi Uduk Cibatok-Cimanggu
restaurants.description: Nasi Uduk Cibatok-Cimanggu is a restaurant located in Bogor.
restaurants.address: Jl. Raya leuwiliang, cibatok bogor (Bogor), Bogor, Jawa Barat 16630

restaurants.name: Bakso Tak Terduga Ciseeng
restaurants.description: Bakso Tak Terduga Ciseeng is a indonesian meatball restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: mie ayam dan Bakso "Mas Uwo"
restaurants.description: mie ayam dan Bakso "Mas Uwo" is a asian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pondok Cabe Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pondok Cabe Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and busiest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with three sub-terminals, T2D for domestic flights, T2E for international flights, and T2F for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, serving mostly international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.
